rows.label: qst202602_msg0001
rows.name:
We're back, Dad. You were right.
Those Herridot Laias were no pushover.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you've defeated them already?
All that jaunting around the world may
have actually made a man of you, Zeke!

rows.label: qst202602_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks, but I really don't need your
empty compliments.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0004
rows.name:
Still as cynical as
ever though, I see...

rows.label: qst202602_msg0005
rows.name:
Splendid work to you too, Ten'i.
Allow me to commend you for your
efforts.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0006
rows.name:
No, I could never have done it alone.
Not without Rex.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0025
rows.name:
No, I could never have done it alone.
Not without Nia.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0026
rows.name:
No, I could never have done it alone.
Not without Zeke.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0027
rows.name:
No, I could never have done it alone.
Not without Meleph.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0007
rows.name:
Is that so...?
Then it appears I made the
right decision to entrust Ten'i to you.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0008
rows.name:
I trust you will continue to keep her
under your wing?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0009
rows.name:
Of course, Your Majesty. She's our
friend. We promise we'll take good
care of her!

rows.label: qst202602_msg0010
rows.name:
Good, good.
Well now, the matter of ensuring
Luxuria's safety has been seen to...

rows.label: qst202602_msg0011
rows.name:
But as it happens, there's more to
this than it first seemed.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0012
rows.name:
Come on, Dad, don't beat about the
bush. Spit it out.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0013
rows.name: You got something else for us to do?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0014
rows.name: You catch on quickly, Saika.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0015
rows.name:
It's about the Herridot Laias. You
defeated one pair of them, but it seems
there are more, this time in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0016
rows.name: Huh? In Invidia...?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0017
rows.name:
Queen Lagert has put out a plea for
help. Given your experience, I would
like to send you to assist her.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0018
rows.name:
The Invidian army already have their
hands full with it as it is.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0019
rows.name:
Yeah, Herridot Laias aren't something
your average Driver can deal with...

rows.label: qst202602_msg0022
rows.name:
What do you say, Ten'i? Will you
accompany them?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0023
rows.name:
What reason have I to refuse a personal
request from His Majesty?

rows.label: qst202602_msg0032
rows.name:
If it is for the good of Alst,
then perhaps it will serve to
atone for my sins...

rows.label: qst202602_msg0028
rows.name:
Now, now, do not burden yourself
so. I'm sure Queen Lagert will be
delighted to hear this.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0029
rows.name:
I'd like you to head now to Fons
Maim Port. You will be given further
instructions upon your arrival.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0030
rows.name: Affirmative.

rows.label: qst202602_msg0031
rows.name: Well then, godspeed.
